name: OR_LNLG_PREOP_PREP
description: This table contains the Preop Prep information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: PREP_DRY_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether or not the pre-op prep site was dry before draping.

columns.name: PREOP_CIRC_PREP_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores whether or not circumferential skin preparation was performed.

columns.name: PREP_DRY_START_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains information regarding when the site prep solution ended and when the drying time began.

columns.name: PREP_DRY_STOP_DTTM
columns.description: This column contains information regarding the time which the site was determined to be dry.

columns.name: PREP_SOLN_APPLIED_DATETIME
columns.description: The time prep solution is applied.

columns.name: PREP_QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity of items used during pre-op preparation.
